title: Threading
description: Running code concurrently using threads, synchronization primitives, and the thread pool. Core types include `Thread`, `ThreadPool`, `Monitor`, `Mutex`, `Semaphore`, and `ManualResetEvent`. For most scenarios, prefer `Task`-based `async`/`await` over direct thread manipulation.
shortDescription: Run code concurrently with threads, thread pools, and synchronization primitives.
